headline: Tredence Recognized as a 'Leader' in Everest Group Data and AI Services Specialists - North America PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: Tredence, a global leader in data science and AI solutions, has been recognized as a Leader and a Star Performer in Everest Group's Data and AI Services Specialists – North America PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Everest Group (EG) Appointing Laura Hay to Its Board After Strong Results
summary: In August 2025, Everest Group announced the appointment of Laura Hay, a seasoned insurance executive and former Global Head of Insurance at KPMG LLP, to its Board of Directors as an independent, non-executive member. Notably, this leadership addition follows Everest Group’s second-quarter performance, highlighted by robust reinsurance results and positive analyst sentiment driven by improved underwriting and capital returns to shareholders. We'll examine how Laura Hay's extensive insurance...
